0.2.name: wordpress/aspen-shortcodes-and-widgets
0.2.description: Aspen Shortcodes and Widgets - a package of useful shortcodes and widgets that will work with any theme. It will ingegrate closely with the Aspen and Weaver II themes. Will also allow you to switch from Aspen or Weaver II to any other theme and still be able to use all the shortcodes and widgets from the themes with minimal effort.
